levels.description: Throws an Alchemical Unit at an ally; for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</>s, this ally and other allies on the 8 surrounding tiles gain DEF <@ba.vup>+{def}</> and recover HP equal to <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_ratio:0%}</> ATK per second
